text: Pixie is an upcoming British comedy thriller film directed by Barnaby Thompson. The film stars Olivia Cooke, Ben Hardy, Daryl McCormack, with Colm Meaney, and Alec Baldwin. Pixie is set to be released in the United Kingdom on 23 October 2020, by Paramount Pictures. ==Premise== A woman and two men find themselves on the run in the Irish countryside after a heist gone wrong. ==Cast== * Olivia Cooke as Pixie * Ben Hardy as Frank * Daryl McCormack * Colm Meaney * Dylan Moran * Alec Baldwin as a priest * Sebastian de Souza as Gareth ==Production== In August 2019, it was announced that shooting for the film had begun in Northern Ireland, with Barnaby Thompson directing. Olivia Cooke, Ben Hardy and Alec Baldwin were among the announced cast. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2020 films Category:2020 comedy films Category:2020 thriller films Category:2020s comedy thriller films Category:British films Category:British comedy thriller films Category:Films set in Ireland Category:Films shot in Northern Ireland Category:Upcoming films
title: Pixie (film)
